info.title: API for the generation of labels, CN22 and CN23 documents
info.description:
ENGLISH:
The API offers services for the generation of labels corresponding to national and international shipments, as well as CN22, CN23, DCAF and DDP documentation.
ESPAÑOL:
La API ofrece servicios para la generación de etiquetas correspondientes a envíos nacionales e internacionales, así como documentación CN22, CN23, DCAF y DDP.

post.description: Print labels and customs documentation (CN22, CN23). As input it has the shipping codes for which the label needs to be obtained, label type (label, customs documentation or all), the output format (PDF, ZPL or XML), the format of printing (A4, label maker) and the starting position of the first label. As output, the labels of all unified shipments will be obtained in a PDF or ZPL based 64. It will also be possible to obtain the label data in XML format for customization by the client.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token

post.description: Documentation printing (DCAF and DDP). As input, it receives data such as the contract number and the customer number, address, town, postal code, number of shipments, the place of signature, ID of the signatory and name of the signatory. As output, the DCAF or DDP document will be obtained in PDF format in base 64.

documentationType.description: Shipment label type to be print  1 (label), 2 (CN22, CN23), 0 (all types)

labelOrderType.description: Indicates how the label type generated  will be sorted.  1 (addressee.internationalDestinyPoBox), 2 (addressee.company), 3 (addressee.lastName1), 4 (package.packageId), 5 (package.clientReference)

clientLogo.description: Base 64 image of the client's logo. It should only be indicated for pallet delivery (XPPCCOOF)

labelFormat.description: Indicates if the generation will be in XML (1), PDF (2) or ZPL (3). For customs documentation CN22 and CN23, only PDF format is permitted.

labelPrintInitialPosition.description: Starting position of the first label

labelPrintMode.description: Indicate whether the generation will be done in A4 format (1) or labeler (2).

documentationType.description: Documentation type to be printed DCAF (5) or DDP (6)

shipmentsNumber.description: Shipments number to be printed in document

destinationCode.description: Destination code, the value will be the zip code or a country code

destinationName.description: Destination name, the value will be the name of a province or a country

addresseeName.description: Addressee Name to be printed in document

clientNumber.description: Client number to be printed in document

contractNumber.description: Contract number to be printed in document
